1.question: Where are your items sourced from?
1.answer: All of the items on sale at Thrift City are donated by customers who no longer want or need these items. We sell them at a much lower price than retail to encourage recycling!

2.question: Are your products clean?
2.answer: Yes, everything that is donated is sanitized and washed before being put up for sale!

3.question: How many days will it take for my items to ship?
3.answer: We want to make sure your purchases are packaged with care and in good condition. Please expect around 3-5 business days for your items to ship.

4.question: Do I need to sign up to make an order?
4.answer: Nope! We are currently working on a rewards program for our loyal customers which you can sign up for to earn rewards over time, but for now you can buy items without any account!

5.question: What payment methods can I use?
5.answer: We accept credit and debit cards.
